title: Food and Drinks
description: Anna talks about the food and drinks she eats every day.
speaker: Anna
text: Today, I want to talk about food and drinks.
In the morning, I eat breakfast at home.
For lunch, I eat rice and chicken.
In the evening, I eat a light dinner.

questions.q: What does Anna eat for breakfast?
What does Anna drink in the morning?
What kind of food does Anna like?
